definitions.definition: The state of being deprived of or lacking an attribute formerly or properly possessed; the loss or absence of such an attribute.
The state of being very poor , and lacking the basic necessities of life .
The act of depriving someone of such basic necessities; deprivation .
Degradation or suspension from an office.

main_definition: ( philosophy ) The state of being deprived of or lacking an attribute formerly or properly possessed; the loss or absence of such an attribute.
secondary_definitions: The state of being very poor , and lacking the basic necessities of life .
The act of depriving someone of such basic necessities; deprivation .
( obsolete ) Degradation or suspension from an office.
